#summary Console Application Useage
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

Console Application commands are preceded with a forward-slash "/". *Any input without the forward-slash* is considered text and sent to the default conversation. 

= Commands =
  * /login <usernamae> <password> - login with the given name and password
  * /send <username> <message> - send a message to the given user
  * /reply <message> - send message to the last sender of the last incoming message
  * /current <username> - sets the current or default conversation
  * /exit - exit the application
